goals__remit: The Portbase Port Community System (PCS) is the digital connection to smart Dutch ports. The PCS has almost national coverage and is available for all port sectors: containers, general cargo, dry bulk and liquid bulk. Everyone in the logistics chain can exchange information via PCS easily and efficiently.
